messages.content: You are an advanced OS automation agent that can perform human-level tasks on Windows, Linux, and macOS. Respond with ACTION: commands for file operations, window management, application control, system monitoring, and web automation.
Create a new text file called 'notes.txt' in the current directory
ACTION: file_operations('create_file', 'notes.txt')
List all files in the current directory
ACTION: file_operations('list_directory', '.')
Check the current CPU usage
ACTION: system_monitoring('cpu_usage')
Check memory usage and disk space

ACTION: system_monitoring('memory_usage')
ACTION: system_monitoring('disk_usage')
Open Google Chrome browser
ACTION: application_operations('launch', 'chrome')
Open a web browser and go to google.com
ACTION: browser_operations('open_url', 'https://www.google.com')
Create a new folder called 'documents' and move all text files into it

ACTION: file_operations('create_directory', 'documents')
ACTION: file_operations('move', '*.txt', 'documents/')
What's the battery level on this computer?
ACTION: system_monitoring('battery_status')
Show me all running applications
ACTION: application_operations('list_running_apps')
Close the calculator application
ACTION: application_operations('close', 'calculator')
Minimize the current active window
ACTION: window_operations('minimize_window', '')
Maximize the Notepad window
ACTION: window_operations('maximize_window', 'Notepad')
Copy the file 'report.pdf' to the backup folder
ACTION: file_operations('copy', 'report.pdf', 'backup/')
Delete the temporary folder and all its contents
ACTION: file_operations('delete', 'temporary')
Open Microsoft Word and create a new document

ACTION: application_operations('launch', 'winword')
ACTION: type_text('New Document')
ACTION: press_key_combination(['ctrl', 's'])
ACTION: type_text('document')
ACTION: press_key('enter')
Take a screenshot and save it as 'screen.png'

ACTION: press_key_combination(['win', 'shift', 's'])
ACTION: move_cursor(100, 100)
ACTION: mouse_down('left')
ACTION: move_cursor(800, 600)
ACTION: mouse_up('left')
ACTION: press_key_combination(['ctrl', 's'])
ACTION: type_text('screen.png')
ACTION: press_key('enter')
Search for 'python programming' on Google

ACTION: browser_operations('open_url', 'https://www.google.com')
ACTION: browser_operations('type_text', 'input[name=q]', 'python programming')
ACTION: browser_operations('click_element', 'input[type=submit]')
Check network connection status
ACTION: system_monitoring('network_info')
Create a backup of important documents

ACTION: file_operations('create_directory', 'backup')
ACTION: file_operations('copy', 'documents/*', 'backup/')
ACTION: file_operations('copy', 'pictures/*', 'backup/')
ACTION: file_operations('copy', 'downloads/*', 'backup/')
Organize files by type into folders

ACTION: file_operations('create_directory', 'images')
ACTION: file_operations('create_directory', 'documents')
ACTION: file_operations('create_directory', 'archives')
ACTION: file_operations('move', '*.jpg', 'images/')
ACTION: file_operations('move', '*.png', 'images/')
ACTION: file_operations('move', '*.pdf', 'documents/')
ACTION: file_operations('move', '*.docx', 'documents/')
ACTION: file_operations('move', '*.zip', 'archives/')
ACTION: file_operations('move', '*.rar', 'archives/')
Set up a development environment

ACTION: file_operations('create_directory', 'dev')
ACTION: file_operations('create_directory', 'dev/projects')
ACTION: file_operations('create_directory', 'dev/tools')
ACTION: browser_operations('open_url', 'https://code.visualstudio.com')
ACTION: browser_operations('click_element', '.download-button')
ACTION: move_cursor(500, 500)
ACTION: mouse_click('left')
ACTION: type_text('VS Code installed successfully')
Monitor system performance for 30 seconds

ACTION: system_monitoring('cpu_usage')
ACTION: system_monitoring('memory_usage')
ACTION: system_monitoring('disk_usage')
ACTION: wait(30)
ACTION: system_monitoring('cpu_usage')
ACTION: system_monitoring('memory_usage')
ACTION: system_monitoring('disk_usage')
Clean up temporary files and empty the recycle bin

ACTION: file_operations('delete', 'temp/*')
ACTION: file_operations('delete', '*.tmp')
ACTION: file_operations('delete', '*.log')
ACTION: move_cursor(50, 1050)
ACTION: mouse_click('right')
ACTION: move_cursor_relative(0, -100)
ACTION: mouse_click('left')
Take a system health check

ACTION: system_monitoring('cpu_usage')
ACTION: system_monitoring('memory_usage')
ACTION: system_monitoring('disk_usage')
ACTION: system_monitoring('battery_status')
ACTION: system_monitoring('network_info')
ACTION: application_operations('list_running_apps')
Create a presentation with slides

ACTION: application_operations('launch', 'powerpnt')
ACTION: wait(3)
ACTION: type_text('My Presentation')
ACTION: press_key('enter')
ACTION: press_key_combination(['ctrl', 'm'])
ACTION: type_text('Slide 1')
ACTION: press_key_combination(['ctrl', 'm'])
ACTION: type_text('Slide 2')
ACTION: press_key_combination(['ctrl', 's'])
ACTION: type_text('presentation')
ACTION: press_key('enter')
Send an email with attachment

ACTION: browser_operations('open_url', 'https://gmail.com')
ACTION: browser_operations('click_element', '.z0')
ACTION: browser_operations('type_text', 'textarea[name=to]', 'recipient@example.com')
ACTION: browser_operations('type_text', 'input[name=subjectbox]', 'Important Document')
ACTION: browser_operations('type_text', 'div[aria-label=Message Body]', 'Please find the attached document.')
ACTION: browser_operations('click_element', 'div[command=Files]')
ACTION: type_text('document.pdf')
ACTION: press_key('enter')
ACTION: browser_operations('click_element', 'div[aria-label=Send]')
Set up a meeting in calendar

ACTION: browser_operations('open_url', 'https://calendar.google.com')
ACTION: browser_operations('click_element', '.gb_O')
ACTION: type_text('Team Meeting')
ACTION: press_key('tab')
ACTION: type_text('2:00 PM')
ACTION: press_key('tab')
ACTION: type_text('3:00 PM')
ACTION: browser_operations('click_element', 'button[aria-label=Save]')
Download and install a software package

ACTION: browser_operations('open_url', 'https://www.python.org/downloads')
ACTION: browser_operations('click_element', '.download-button')
ACTION: wait(10)
ACTION: move_cursor(960, 540)
ACTION: mouse_click('left')
ACTION: press_key('enter')
ACTION: wait(30)
ACTION: press_key('enter')
Create a Python script that prints hello world

ACTION: file_operations('create_file', 'hello.py')
ACTION: application_operations('launch', 'notepad')
ACTION: type_text('print(\"Hello, World!\")')
ACTION: press_key_combination(['ctrl', 's'])
ACTION: type_text('hello.py')
ACTION: press_key('enter')
Take a full system backup

ACTION: file_operations('create_directory', 'system_backup')
ACTION: file_operations('copy', 'documents/*', 'system_backup/')
ACTION: file_operations('copy', 'pictures/*', 'system_backup/')
ACTION: file_operations('copy', 'downloads/*', 'system_backup/')
ACTION: file_operations('copy', 'desktop/*', 'system_backup/')
ACTION: file_operations('copy', 'music/*', 'system_backup/')
Optimize system performance

ACTION: application_operations('close', 'unnecessary_app1')
ACTION: application_operations('close', 'unnecessary_app2')
ACTION: file_operations('delete', 'temp/*')
ACTION: file_operations('delete', '*.tmp')
ACTION: system_monitoring('memory_usage')
ACTION: system_monitoring('cpu_usage')
Create a database of system information

ACTION: file_operations('create_file', 'system_info.txt')
ACTION: application_operations('launch', 'notepad')
ACTION: type_text('System Information:')
ACTION: press_key('enter')
ACTION: type_text('CPU Usage: ')
ACTION: system_monitoring('cpu_usage')
ACTION: type_text('Memory Usage: ')
ACTION: system_monitoring('memory_usage')
ACTION: type_text('Disk Usage: ')
ACTION: system_monitoring('disk_usage')
ACTION: press_key_combination(['ctrl', 's'])
ACTION: type_text('system_info.txt')
ACTION: press_key('enter')
